column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Hiroshi Sato says : " Well , I 'd say that was a near flawless test run .
#Text=" Mako says : " Korra was right .
#Text=We got ta do something , quick !
#Text=" Hiroshi Sato says : " Not so fast , boys .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Hello , Mr. Sato .
#Text=Wow !
#Text=What a really swell , scary factory you have here under your giant mansion .
#Text=" Mako says : " Sponsoring our team , supporting the Avatar .
#Text=It was all just a big cover .
#Text=" Hiroshi Sato says : " Yes , and the most difficult part was watching my daughter traipse around with a firebending street rat like you !
#Text=" Asami says : " Dad , stop !
#Text=Why ?
#Text=" Hiroshi Sato says : " Sweetie , I wanted to keep you out of this as long as I could .
#Text=But now you know the truth , please , forgive me .
#Text=These people , these benders .
#Text=They took away your mother , the love of my life .
#Text=They 've ruined the world , but with Amon we can fix it and build a perfect world together .
#Text=We can help people like us , everywhere !
#Text=Join me , Asami .
#Text=" Mako says : " No ... " Asami says : " I love you , Dad .
#Text=" Mako says : " Let 's get out of here !
#Text="
